<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>catalog_item</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
    if (isLoading || newValue === '') {
        return;
    }
    g_ui_scripts.getUIScript('x_376477_srcc.execute')
        .then(function(controller) {

            var request = {
                name: 'onChange',
                request: {
                    control: control,
                    oldValue: oldValue,
                    newValue: newValue,
                    isLoading: isLoading,
                    isTemplate: isTemplate
                },

                view: function view(response) {
                    g_form.addInfoMessage('g_ui_scripts/success: ' + response);
                }
            };

            return controller.execute(request);
        });
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-29 17:15:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b9780330dbee6110a049d8b6f49619ca</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>catalog_item</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Scoped Resuable Client Code" source="x_376477_srcc">acc8c9e8db2a2110a049d8b6f49619d8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Scoped Resuable Client Code">acc8c9e8db2a2110a049d8b6f49619d8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_b9780330dbee6110a049d8b6f49619ca</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-29 17:15:24</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>1</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
